verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Great and wonderful are Your works
Upright and true are Your ways
Our desire is to follow You
And serve You all of our days

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are Yours, Jesus we are Yours
Take our lives and use them for Your work
May our prayer make a difference in this world
Use us, Lord, for Your glory we are Yours

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Your heart is pierced for the love of Your people
Your hands, reaching out to the world
To the lost, the broken, the poor and the hungry
You are there, hidden in the crowd
You are there

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Give us eyes to see You in the needy
Let our ears hear the cry of the poor
Give us words that will love You
Hearts that are humble
Let Your light shine to the world
Make us Yours
